overview: All about Clara Morgane. From her first test with Greg Centuro to her consecration to the latest Hot d'Or, discover the intimacy of daily hot Clara. Through her sexual games with Estelle Dessanges and Rumika, her duets with Greg, her constant pleasure of choosing and wearing exciting lingerie, her confidence, her confessions, Clara reveals and gives us all her secrets (even the unmentionable ). A document of uncompromising truth by Fred Coppula.
title: Les Dessous de Clara Morgane
